Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Financial/Business | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Thursdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: July 12, 2012

Bank of Dave follows one man's efforts to try and revolutionise how people bank. With the global financial system is in a mess, customers are feeling short-changed and small-business owners are struggling to secure loans to help their businesses. David Fishwick believes that he can do a better job than the high-street banks and he plans to open his own small bank in the Lancashire town of Burnley and make it profitable in just 180 days.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32160)
